name: Angela Mosalca
review: Amir is not just a developer, He's  a creative problem-solver with a keen eye for detail, I'd absolutely reccomend him to do your website

name: Jared Biunno
review: I highly recommend Amir as a Software Developer. His seamless integration of front and back end skills ensures the delivery of high quality solutions. Was fortunate to work with him.

name: Leonardo Pattuzzo
review: Amir is a great guy to work with, very understanding, and never failed to complete a request I had for him.
